root: ^Hello! How can I serve you Mr.Detective?

c-0: ^What were you doing here the night of the victim's death?
^Nothing Much, just here serving my usual drinks. Nothing out of the ordinary
c-1: ^The night of the victim's death, did you happen to see anything happen?
^I saw this intense flash of light come from the doorway!
^It nearly blinded me I couldn't see anything else for a solid while!
g-0: ^Did you still need to talk to me?

c-3: ^Alrighty tell me if you need anything!
